faqs.question: What is the typical price range if I want to buy house in Sector 58 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing in Sector 58 varies significantly based on the type of house, the plot size, and the age of construction. Factors like internal fittings, community amenities, and proximity to the main road also impact the final valuation.
